ratatoskr

Module cache 

Source
Expand description

Caching subsystem.

Three independent caches:

  • ModelCache â€” ephemeral model metadata fetched from providers at runtime. Populated by ModelGateway::fetch_model_metadata(), consulted as a fallback when the registry has no entry.

  • response::ResponseCache â€” opt-in LRU + TTL cache for deterministic operations (embeddings, NLI). Activated via the builderâ€™s .response_cache() method. See response module docs for architecture and future extensibility notes.

  • discovery::ParameterDiscoveryCache â€” records parameter rejections from providers at runtime, preventing repeated failures. On by default; opt-out via RatatoskrBuilder::disable_parameter_discovery().

pub use response::CacheConfig;
pub use response::ResponseCache;
